description: Latin retributus, past participle of retribuo (“I retribute”); prefix re- + tribuo (“I bestow, assign, pay”). See tribute.

verbs.description: retribute (third-person singular simple present retributes, present participle retributing, simple past and past participle retributed)

entries.meaning: To pay back; to give in return, as payment, reward, or punishment; to requite.
examples: to retribute someone for their kindness
to retribute just punishment to a criminal
